Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, running through the Administrative section.
Room.LongDescription: There are two large buildings taking up and entire block on both the east and west sides of the road. On the east side is the city guard barracks and offices. On the west is the Oceancrest Detention and Correctional Facility. There are no doors or other entrances on this side of both of these buildings.
